text: Kare ga o yurushi ni nara reta mono no soto, gozen de no torinashi wa muekidearu. Yagate kare-ra no kokoro no osore ga kieru to tenshi-tachi wa iu. `Anata gata no omo wa, nanto ose rareta nodesu ka.' Suru to kare-ra wa (kotaete),`shinrideshita. Kare wa, shiko ni shite shidai no okatadesu.' To iu
